mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yesterday_tmp(date, high,fx,low,fl, type, cid) VALUES (#{date},#{high},#{fx},#{low},#{fl},#{type},#{cid});
mapper.update: UPDATE yesterday, yesterday_tmp SET yesterday.date = CASE WHEN yesterday.date <> yesterday_tmp.date THEN yesterday_tmp.date END, yesterday.fl = CASE WHEN yesterday.fl <> yesterday_tmp.fl THEN yesterday_tmp.fl END, yesterday.high = CASE WHEN yesterday.high <> yesterday_tmp.high THEN yesterday_tmp.high END, yesterday.low = CASE WHEN yesterday.low <> yesterday_tmp.low THEN yesterday_tmp.low END, yesterday.fx = CASE WHEN yesterday.fx <> yesterday_tmp.fx THEN yesterday_tmp.fx END, yesterday.type = CASE WHEN yesterday.type <> yesterday_tmp.type THEN yesterday_tmp.type END WHERE yesterday.cid = yesterday_tmp.cid
